txt.en:
'The half-orcs at Târ Stazg prepare for battle; one of the messengers out of Barad Morlas must have reached them sometime in the night.

'We cannot allow them to bring a force to bear at Barad Morlas. Assail their camp and reduce their numbers; it will be with a small host that they will issue forth to strengthen the battle.

'Târ Stazg lies north-east of Echad Dúnann along the mountains before the Redhorn Gate. Go as quickly as you can and return once their numbers have been reduced.'
'You have done a brave deed thinning the ranks of the half-orcs, [placeholder]. Perhaps now they will not be so quick to render aid to Barad Morlas.'
'Târ Stazg is north-east of Echad Dúnann along the mountains before the Redhorn Gate. You must hurry before they bring aid to Barad Morlas!'
'You have done a brave deed thinning the ranks of the half-orcs.'
A messenger from Barad Morlas has reached the half-orcs at Târ Stazg, warning them of the presence of the Elves in Eregion.
Târ Stazg is north-east of Echad Dúnann along the mountains before the Redhorn Gate.\n\nPalanaer has asked you to journey to Târ Stazg and defeat the Half-orcs before they can reinforce Barad Morlas.
Talk to Palanaer at Echad Dúnann
Palanaer is in Echad Dúnann south-west of Târ Stazg.\n\nYou should return to Palanaer and tell him of the half-orc defeat.
